verses.verse: And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> was brought <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> and Potiphar, <S%H6318><s%> an officer <S%H5631><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> captain <S%H8269><s%> of the guard, <S%H2876><s%> an Egyptian, <S%H4713><s%> bought <S%H7069><s%> him of the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the Ishmeelites, <S%H3459><s%> which <S%H834><s%> had brought <S%H3381><s%> him down <S%H3381><s%> thither. <S%H8033><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was with Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and he was a prosperous <S%H6743><s%> man; <S%H376><s%> and he was in the house <S%H1004><s%> of his master <S%H113><s%> the Egyptian. <S%H4713><s%>

And his master <S%H113><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was with him, and that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> made all <S%H3605><s%> that he did <S%H6213><s%> to prosper <S%H6743><s%> in his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in his sight, <S%H5869><s%> and he served <S%H8334><s%> him: and he made him overseer <S%H6485><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> his house, <S%H1004><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that he had <S%H3426><s%> he put <S%H5414><s%> into his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass from the time that he had <S%H3426><s%> made him overseer <S%H6485><s%> in his house, <S%H1004><s%> and over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that he had, <S%H3426><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> the Egyptian's <S%H4713><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> for Joseph's <S%H3130><s%> sake; <S%H1558><s%> and the blessing <S%H1293><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was on all <S%H3605><s%> that he had <S%H3426><s%> in the house, <S%H1004><s%> and in the field. <S%H7704><s%>

And he left <S%H5800><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that he had in Joseph's <S%H3130><s%> hand; <S%H3027><s%> and he knew <S%H3045><s%> not ought <S%H3972><s%> he had, save <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he did eat. <S%H398><s%> And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> was a goodly <S%H3303><s%> <S%H8389><s%> person, and well <S%H3303><s%> favored. <S%H4758><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass after <S%H310><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things, <S%H1697><s%> that his master's <S%H113><s%> wife <S%H802><s%> cast <S%H5375><s%> her eyes <S%H5869><s%> on Joseph; <S%H3130><s%> and she said, <S%H559><s%> Lie <S%H7901><s%> with me.

But he refused, <S%H3985><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to his master's <S%H113><s%> wife, <S%H802><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> my master <S%H113><s%> wotteth <S%H3045><s%> not what <S%H4100><s%> is with me in the house, <S%H1004><s%> and he has committed <S%H5414><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that he has <S%H3426><s%> to my hand; <S%H3027><s%>

There is none <S%H369><s%> greater <S%H1419><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> I; neither <S%H3808><s%> has he kept <S%H2820><s%> back <S%H2820><s%> any <S%H3972><s%> thing <S%H3972><s%> from me but you, because <S%H834><s%> you are his wife: <S%H802><s%> how <S%H349><s%> then can I do <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> wickedness, <S%H7451><s%> and sin <S%H2398><s%> against God? <S%H430><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, as she spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Joseph <S%H3130><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> by day, <S%H3117><s%> that he listened <S%H8085><s%> not to her, to lie <S%H7901><s%> by her, or to be with her.

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass about this <S%H2088><s%> time, <S%H3117><s%> that Joseph went <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> his business; <S%H4399><s%> and there was none <S%H369><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> within. <S%H1004><s%>

And she caught <S%H8610><s%> him by his garment, <S%H899><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Lie <S%H7901><s%> with me: and he left <S%H5800><s%> his garment <S%H899><s%> in her hand, <S%H3027><s%> and fled, <S%H5127><s%> and got <S%H3318><s%> him out.
And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when she saw <S%H7200><s%> that he had left <S%H5800><s%> his garment <S%H899><s%> in her hand, <S%H3027><s%> and was fled <S%H5127><s%> forth, <S%H2351><s%>

That she called <S%H7121><s%> to the men <S%H582><s%> of her house, <S%H1004><s%> and spoke <S%H559><s%> to them, saying, <S%H559><s%> See, <S%H7200><s%> he has brought <S%H935><s%> in an Hebrew <S%H5680><s%> to us to mock <S%H6711><s%> us; he came <S%H935><s%> in to me to lie <S%H7901><s%> with me, and I cried <S%H7121><s%> with a loud <S%H1419><s%> voice: <S%H6963><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when he heard <S%H8085><s%> that I lifted <S%H7311><s%> up my voice <S%H6963><s%> and cried, <S%H7121><s%> that he left <S%H5800><s%> his garment <S%H899><s%> with me, and fled, <S%H5127><s%> and got <S%H3318><s%> him out.
And she laid <S%H5117><s%> up his garment <S%H899><s%> by her, until <S%H5704><s%> his lord <S%H113><s%> came <S%H935><s%> home. <S%H1004><s%>

And she spoke <S%H1696><s%> to him according to these <S%H428><s%> words, <S%H1697><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> The Hebrew <S%H5680><s%> servant, <S%H5650><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have brought <S%H935><s%> to us, came <S%H935><s%> in to me to mock <S%H6711><s%> me:

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, as I lifted <S%H7311><s%> up my voice <S%H6963><s%> and cried, <S%H7121><s%> that he left <S%H5800><s%> his garment <S%H899><s%> with me, and fled <S%H5127><s%> out.

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when his master <S%H113><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of his wife, <S%H802><s%> which <S%H834><s%> she spoke <S%H1696><s%> to him, saying, <S%H559><s%> After this <S%H428><s%> manner <S%H1697><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%> to me; that his wrath <S%H639><s%> was kindled. <S%H2734><s%>

And Joseph's <S%H3130><s%> master <S%H113><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> him, and put <S%H5414><s%> him into <S%H413><s%> the prison, <S%H1004><s%> <S%H5470><s%> a place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> the king's <S%H4428><s%> prisoners <S%H615><s%> were bound: <S%H631><s%> and he was there <S%H8033><s%> in the prison. <S%H1004><s%> <S%H5470><s%>

But the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was with Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and showed <S%H5186><s%> him mercy, <S%H2617><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> him favor <S%H2580><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the keeper <S%H8269><s%> of the prison. <S%H1004><s%>

And the keeper <S%H8269><s%> of the prison <S%H1004><s%> <S%H5470><s%> committed <S%H5414><s%> to Joseph's <S%H3130><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the prisoners <S%H615><s%> that were in the prison; <S%H1004><s%> <S%H5470><s%> and whatever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> they did <S%H6213><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> he was the doer <S%H6213><s%> of it.

The keeper <S%H8269><s%> of the prison <S%H1004><s%> <S%H5470><s%> looked <S%H7200><s%> not to any <S%H3972><s%> thing <S%H3972><s%> that was under his hand; <S%H3027><s%> because <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was with him, and that which <S%H834><s%> he did, <S%H6213><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> made it to prosper. <S%H6743><s%>
